title: Tennis cake
description: Mary’s light fruit cake is covered with marzipan and fondant icing to look like a tennis court, but you can easily adapt it to your sport of choice. A great birthday cake for sports fans!You will need a deep 23x15cm/9x6in rectangular cake tin and 4 nozzles for piping (no. 2 writing nozzle, no. 3 writing nozzle, no. 7 small star nozzle and no. 8 medium star nozzle).
ingredients: 350g/12oz red or natural glacé cherries, cut into quarters
1 x 225g tin pineapple in natural juice, drained and roughly chopped
150g/5½oz icing sugar, sifted, plus extra for rolling
gel food colouring in dusky pink and autumn leaf
gel food colouring in mint green
